validation.validation: At least 1 channel you entered is invalid for either the Campaign Type or the Campaign Item Type Override.
You must configure Push Configuration Data to use Push Notification as a channel.
You must configure Email Configuration Data to use Email as a channel.
Set a Content for the Content Type.
Select a content valid for the Item Type.
You can only have a maximum of 3 reminders configured for a Campaign Item.
Set a CC External Field value that's valid for the Connect Type.
Please use unique reminder titles within an item.
Due data is required for a Campaign Item with a Reminder.
Set a Campaign Category that's valid for the Connect Type.
No Item has a static Send On Date.
Set an Exclusion Rule that is valid for Connect Type
All Campaign Items with relative Send Dates have to eventually reference an Item with a static date.
